App Data Tracker is an Apex application that runs automatically in the background as a system service, and helps to aggregate and persist metrics from all running applications.

The YARN queue in which the App Data Tracker application should be placed: (This change won't take effect until App Data Tracker is restarted.)

Usage Reporting

If enabled, your DataTorrent installation will send various pieces of information such as bug reporting and usage statistics back to our servers.
